channel.title: An Actual Complete Fix To Weapon Attack Speeds
channel.description:
Does it exist?
I mean, not just changing the speed in Client.java from 1 to 6, that doesn't solve the problem.
I mean, each weapon is forced to attack at that speed and can t attack quicker than the speed permits, plus it will hit again the next time without having to click attack. It really ruins Pking when 2 people come with Dharok axes and hit like 4 30s in 2 seconds.
So you can't click on someone 5 times and get 5 hits.
Ive been trying to figure it out but got no where.
Is there a released fix for this, it would really help
Thanks.

item.title: An Actual Complete Fix To Weapon Attack Speeds
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Yes, it’s possible, just combine logic and System.currentTimeMillis.

Read full topic
item.source: An Actual Complete Fix To Weapon Attack Speeds

item.title: An Actual Complete Fix To Weapon Attack Speeds
item.dc:creator: @Prozor Prozor
item.description:
@Prozor wrote:

Yeah, forcing the player to attack repeatly at certain times like on real rs and not just add 3 times in one second.

This combat issue is what makes Private Servers alot less popular than they would/should be.

Read full topic
item.source: An Actual Complete Fix To Weapon Attack Speeds
